isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - CHANGING THE INPUT SHAFT - REASSEMBLY

step1.para: Install a new bushing in the pocket of the input shaft.
Install the new input shaft into splines of main drive gear, just far enough to expose snap ring groove in I.D. of drive gear.
Install the snap ring in snap ring groove inside drive gear.
Install the drive gear spacer on input shaft.
Install the drive gear bearing on input shaft and into case bore.
Install front bearing cover and gasket. Make sure to align the oil return hole in the case with the hole in the cover.
To facilitate proper reinstallation of the shifter housing assembly on the case, make sure the mainshaft sliding clutches are placed in the neutral position.
Install the shifter housing assembly, the front bearing cover and all other parts and assemblies previously removed, making sure to replace the gaskets.
